availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin F. Patterson (Mercer County, KY, grocer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Crutcher Patterson. Father of James Patterson, Josephine Patterson, Benjamin Patterson, Catherine Patterson, Susan Patterson, John Patterson, Beriah Patterson, Frank Patterson, and David Patterson. Wagoner in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Grocer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860.
